Question.Subject: Why can't I get onto solefootwear.co.uk?
Question.Content:
I saw an ad in a magazine for it, but i can't get on |: Is it just me? Can you get on the site?
This is what it says when i try visit the site: Forbidden You don't have permission to access / on this server.
Additionally, a 404 Not Found error was encountered while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request.
What is this all about? Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi They've have had a holding page up since Friday, as they further develop their site.
I have just checked and guess what......... it's back on!! Whoop whoop!

Answer.Content:
Hi They've have had a holding page up since Friday, as they further develop their site.
I have just checked and guess what......... it's back on!! Whoop whoop!
